scripts.setup: yarn install && lerna bootstrap && yarn run link-all && yarn run build-all
scripts.setup-dev: yarn install && lerna bootstrap && yarn run link-all
scripts.clean: find ./src -name 'node_modules' -type d -prune -exec rm -rf '{}' + && find ./src -name 'dist' -type d -prune -exec rm -rf '{}' +
scripts.publish-npm: yarn run clean && yarn run setup && yarn run prepublishOnly && yarn run publish-all
